name: REWIND the time to save the world fom the VIRUS
name_original: REWIND the time to save the world fom the VIRUS
description:
The world is affected by a terrible pandemic. Scientists have finally found the cure, but it's too late. Your mission is to rewind time to when the virus where first discovered and prevent it from spreading to the whole world.

Test suspected patients and give medicine to those infected. Also, the virus spread quickly between one person to another, so try and keep them away from each other.  You will find that they are a bit dumb and don't practice social distance.

Controls:

  •  Arrow keys to move
  •  Space bar to pick up/drop people and objects
  • 'F' to apply test or give medication

Levels:

Three days (stages) where 2/2/3 random people are secretly infected. At the end of 2 min, you gain points for each non infected person. You can rewind each day to set a high score.

This is my first time participating in a game jam. Ran out of time at the end. Programming by me, graphics and music by my brother.  : )
